18using UnityEngine;
19using System.Collections;
20
21namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
22{
26 public class NavBarPressButton : MonoBehaviour
27 {
28 [HideInInspector]
29 public GameObject navBar;
33 private readonly float disableTime = 0.1f;
34
38 private bool buttonPressDisabled = false;
39
44 void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
45 {
46 if (buttonPressDisabled) return;
47 buttonPressDisabled = true;
48 GetComponentInParent<VRUIControlBarButton>().Highlight();
49 }
50
55 void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
56 {
57 if (!buttonPressDisabled) return;
58
59 foreach (Transform child in transform.parent.parent)
60 {
61 child.GetComponent<VRUIControlBarButton>().Release();
62 }
63
64 navBar.GetComponent<NavBar>().activateSubMenu(transform.parent.name);
65 GetComponentInParent<VRUIControlBarButton>().Press();
66
67 StartCoroutine(EnableAfterSeconds());
68 }
69
74 IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds()
75 {
76 yield return new WaitForSeconds(disableTime);
77 buttonPressDisabled = false;
78 }
79 }
80}

Class representing the NavBar of the hand UI menu.
